page.title: 18LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: A questionaire was prepared and sent to{fifty homes in the area}asking for information about{leisure time {activities.}The most popular one was {swimming and seven out of the nine had {lessons with a special club. Football was also very popular and those taking part trained with a club. Other activities included{horse riding, {golf, majorettes, bird-watching, {roller-skating,tennis, squash and {several individual collections,e.g. {rubbers, paper weights. Several {families have avaries. The cost of the activities depended on whether the people belonged to a club, took special lessons and/or needed special equipment. Club members met regularly (usually once a week) but others followed their interests when they felt inclined.
